channel.title: books on Escape Velocity
channel.description: Recent content in books on Escape Velocity

item.title: Books galore
item.description: Nancy Leveson: Engineering a safer world. Wassili Golowanow: Die Insel. Merlin Sheldrake: Entangled life: How fungi make our worlds, change our minds & shape our futures. Charles Seife: Decoding the universe. Jurek Becker: Am Strand von Bochum ist allerhand los. Ryusho Kadota, Akira Tokuhiro, Simon Varnam: On the brink: The inside story of Fukushima Daiichi. Adam Higginbotham: Midnight in Chernobyl. Fabian Scheidler: The end of the megamachine: a brief history of a failing civilization.
